name: Orb of Light
description: You create a small orb which sheds light. The light is of the listed intensity.

name: Calm Emotions
description: You temporarily suppress any negative emotions from creatures around you. A creature can resist this by making a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check. A creature affected removes the [@state Anger @] or [@state Rage @] State and reduces the [@state Fear @] State by one degree. This spell does not stop actions done in cold blood. This effect only lasts until the End Phase, at which point the negative emotions return.

name: Flare
description: You create a bright flash of light around you. Any creature, other than you, within the area must make a [@skill PhR @] Check or suffer the [@state Partially Blind @] state for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure. If the DoF is 10 or greater, the creature instead gains the [@state Totally Blind @] state until they have less than 10 rounds left.
A creature gains a `+4` to their Resistance Check if they are looking away or have their eyes covered. Closing eyes is not sufficient to count as cover.

name: Light Screen
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the [@trait Imbued @] trait. Attacks using the Darkness Damage Type cause double damage to the barrier.

effect: The barrier does not take damage from attacks using the Physical Damage Group that do not have the [@trait Imbued @] trait.

name: Perceive
description: You improve your perceptive abilities. Your [@skill Notice @] and [@skill Search @] Skill Checks gain the listed power bonus. Your [@skill Magic Appraisal @] Skill Checks to sense and measure mana gain the same power bonus.

name: Armor of Light
description: You create a suit of natural armor around your body made from pure light. You gain the listed Armor Value against Force and Light Damage and half as much against the Physical and Elemental Damage Groups.

name: Rebuke Darkness
description: You cause all shadows with the area to be banished. On the End Phase, any darkness-based creature in the area must make a [@skill SR @] Check or take 20 Force Damage per Degree of Failure (Rex creatures multiply the damage by their Rex Multiplier).

name: Detect Negative Emotions
description: You can sense all negative emotions and the presence of creatures based on negative emotions in the area around you. You can only count number of number of creatures feeling negative emotions and gain a sense the amount of negative emotions in the area but not their location. You are able to determine the exact location of creatures based on negative emotion.

name: Light Beam
description: You project a beam of energy that deals Light Damage.

name: Hologram
description: You create an active figment illusion that is no larger than the listed size. The hologram is made of light so it cannot interact with any object and disappears if hit by an attack with the [@trait Imbued @] or [@trait Immaterial @] trait. A creature can determine that the hologram is an illusion by making an Almost Impossible (24) [@skill Notice @] Check or a Very Difficult (16) [@skill Search @] Check. The hologram can act and be discovered as per the rules for active figment illusions.

effect: 3 cubic feet or about a Medium sized creature
50 cubic feet or about a Large sized creature
150 cubic feet or about a Huge sized creature
300 cubic feet or about a Gargantuan sized creature

name: Chains of Light
description: You create chains made from pure light. Make a [@action Trap @] maneuver using the listed [@stat Strength @] for the Opposed Characteristic Check. The chains have the [@trait Immaterial @] trait and a Fortitude of 25. While immaterial, the chains can interact with material objects.

name: Control Light
description: You can modify and control the form, color, and intensity of light within the area. A light-based creature must pass a [@skill SR @] Check or fall under your control. The creature can repeat this check after a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure or if ordered to do something against its nature. If the creature ever leaves the radius, you lose control.
You can cause any attacks within the area using Light Damage to suffer `D3` on the Offensive Roll.

name: Detect Life
description: You can detect life-forms with the area. The spell only informs you of the number of life-forms and their exact location. A creature can resist being detected by making an [@skill SR @] Check.

name: Spy of Light
description: You create a small orb of light in the shape of an eye. As a free Intention, you can declare that you will see through the orb, but doing so prevents you from seeing with your own body. While seeing through the orb, you have the listed Final Skill Value for [@skill Notice @] and [@skill Search @]. The orb has a Flight Value of 14 but cannot go beyond the listed distance from you or it will disappear. The orb is material but can only be seen on the mana plane and is immune to damage from attacks without the [@trait Imbued @] trait. While you can see the orb, or are seeing through the orb, you can use your [@skill Spell Projection @] for Defensive Rolls to prevent attacks against the orb. The orb always has the same Initiative Roll as you.

name: Imbue with Positive Feeling
description: You cause all creatures within the area to feel an overwilling pleasurable sensations. A creature can resist by making a [@skill SR @] Check. While affected, the creature suffers a `-2` all-action penalty but is immune and oblivious to pain not caused by physical means.

name: Banish Negative Emotions
description: You temporarily banish any negative emotions from creatures around you. A creature can resist this by making a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check. A creature affected removes the [@state Anger @] or [@state Rage @] state and reduces the [@state Fear @] state by one degree. This spell does not stop actions done in cold blood. A creature cannot have negative emotions for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure.

name: Healing Light
description: You cause one creature you target to recover Life Points. This spell does not restore lost or destroyed limbs, nor eliminate penalties.

name: Seeking Sphere
description: You unleash a sphere of light, which you can control using your [@skill Spell Projection @] until it hits its target. If the target dodges, the spell can continue attacking the following round, on your turn, since it has not been destroyed. When the spell causes damage or is blocked, the sphere vanishes. If you stop maintaining the spell, the sphere will act on its own with an Initiative Roll of 0 and will follow the last target. An abandoned sphere that makes an attack has the listed Final Offensive Roll.

name: Zone of Detection
description: You can detect any creature within stationary area. You can change the shape of the area as long as it remains contiguous and has no internal gaps. A creature can resist detection by making a [@skill SR @] Check. The spell only tells you how many creatures are in the zone and their exact location. It can also tell you when another Detection spell attempts to scan the same area as this spell, the caster of the spell can prevent this detection by making a [@skill SR @] Check. A creature that passes the [@skill SR @] Check must make a new one after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Success. Once a creature is detected, it is known until it leaves the area.

name: Enter Another's Dream
description: You can physically enter the dream of a targeted sleeping creature. You have no control over the dream world and anything that happens there will be real for you. The target must have a peaceful dream to be affected by this spell and the moment the dream becomes a nightmare, you stop maintaining the spell, the ze wake up, or ze dies, you are returned to reality right next to the zir. Any Effect spell cast on the target will also affect you. The target can make a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check to prevent you entering their dream. A target that passes the Resistance Check cannot be the target of your spell until ze fall asleep again.

Once you are in the zir dream, you can jump to the dream of another creature within range of the target. The new target can make a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check, passing means that you cannot jump to zir dream.
If the target's dream is within the Veil, you are trapped there.

name: Light Form
description: You target one creature and their body, and all their possessions, transforms into pure light. The target's body gains the [@trait Immaterial @] and [@trait Imbued @] traits and can interact with material objects. Ze gains a power bonus to [@skill Notice @] and [@skill Search @] Checks and a deed bonus to Resistance Checks against effects based on light. Ze also take double damage from Darkness Damage.

effect: As intermediate degree but the Resistance Check bonus applies to all Resistance Checks not against darkness
As advanced degree but the target does not take double damage from Darkness Damage

name: Blessing
description: You create an aura of beneficial energies that only affects your allies. All creatures of your choice within the area around you gain Advantage on their Skill Checks and Resistance Checks. Once a creature leaves the area, ze no longer benefit from the Advantage. A creature cannot benefit from more than one Blessing spell at one time.

name: Create Positive Feeling
description: You create positive feelings in one creature you target. Love, pleasure, or friendship are an example of the feelings you can create. The target can prevent these feelings by making a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check. Ze can repeat the Resistance Check once per day.

name: See Truth
description: You can target one creature who gains the ability to see beyond the material plane. This vision also gives the target a Resistance Check power bonus to see through Phantasmal Illusions.

effect: Ze can see mana, phenom, and spirits
As Base, but ze can see invisible beings

name: Shield from Negative Emotions
description: You enchant a stationary area, making it impossible for darkness-based creatures or creatures composed of negative emotions to enter. Any such creature entering the area must pass a [@skill SR @] or take 10 Force Damage per Degree of Failure and gain the [@state Pain (4) @] state.

name: Find
description: You think of a single person, place, or thing and learn its exact location at the moment you cast the spell, regardless of the distance that separates you. The object can have a vague description or set of conditions it must meet. The object can make a [@skill SR @] Check to attempt to resist. Success means that either the next closest object will have to make a Check or that you fail to find anything.

name: Restore
description: You cause a targeted creature to recover from some amount of the [@state Pain @] state that has been caused by either low stamina, hunger, non-critical damage, or other powers. This spell only removes it, it does not prevent it from coming back.

name: Hypnotic Display
description: You create a stationary hypnotic pattern of lights in a specified location within range. The display can be seen out to the listed range and all creatures that see the display must a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check or gain the [@state Fascinated @] state. An affected creature can make a new Resistance Check after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure or they are attacked.

name: Catastrophic Light
description: You create an explosion of Light Damage in an area.

name: Luminous Material
description: You form a material object out of pure light. The object created cannot have a presence greater than the listed value but is treated as an object with the listed quality. For complex objects, you must have some understand of the expertise to make it.

name: Travel by Light
description: You select any number of objects whose total presence is less than the listed amount and they are transported from one light source to another, up to the maximum distance. An object can make a [@skill SR @] if they wish to prevent the movement.

name: Lord of Dreams
description: You gain control over any type of dream. While in control, you can modify the dream as if you had Nornir 45 (this does not let you gain any other benefit of a high Nornir). If the dream turns into a nightmare, your ability to modify the dream is reduced to that of Nornir 30. The target's dream can make a [@skill SR @] Check to prevent your control, the Resistance Check can be repeated after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.

effect: If you are in the Veil and in an area of positive energy, you can control your surroundings as if it were a dream. Neutral areas and areas of negative energy use the reduced Nornir. This does not work if there is a creature with similar or greater levels of Nornir.

name: Create Creature of Light
description: You create a creature composed of pure light who is completely under your control. The creature has the Beyond the Veil Type and is a Light Elemental. The creature's maximum level can be no greater than two levels lower than yours.

name: Reflecting Prism
description: You create a supernatural barrier of light with a mirror like surface. The barrier is capable of reflecting attack powers back to its source. For the power to be reflected, you must successful block the attack and then the barrier makes a Power Collision, using the listed damage. If defending against an area attack, the barrier only reflects the portion that hits you; it does not reflect the entire area attack. The barrier cannot reflect effect powers. The reflected power uses your [@skill Spell Projection @] for the Offensive Roll and gains any Counter conus from the original attack.

name: Omniscience
description: You can see and hear all actions and thoughts that occur within the listed area. Only creatures who have a presence less than yours, less than the listed amount, and have a Nornir equal to or lower than yours are affected. No Resistance Check is possible.

name: Predict
description: You foresee future events that will occur to a person, place, or thing. You see detailed information about the most probable outcome.

effect: A prediction that is one day away will be very accurate
A prediction that is one year away will be very accurate

name: Prison of Light
description: You enclose a targeted creature in a separate universe composed of light, which takes the form of a glass bead. While the target is within this universe, they have no knowledge of what occurs outside the pocket universe and those outside have no knowledge of what occurs within. The target can make a [@skill SR @] Check to prevent being trapped. On a failure, there is no chance to repeat the Check.

To escape the spell, the target can attack the universe. The universe uses the Rex Damage Type and has an Absorption of 10 and a Regeneration of 19. From the outside, the glass bead can only be damaged by an [@trait Imbued (18) @] attack.

effect: The prison cannot be broken from the inside

name: One with the Light
description: You enter a state of meditation in which your body becomes one with the light. You leave this world and travel to the nexus to nourish yourself with the energies found there. While there, you are only aware of your own body, the passage of time is meaningless. Your Mana Recovery is multiplied by 10 and gain a physical and spiritual Regeneration Value of 16. While there is no maintenance cost, you can remain in the nexus for the listed time, you can try to leave early but there is a 50% chance it will take you the entire time.

name: Ascension
description: You target one creature to have their essence infused with divine energy. The target's Nornir becomes the listed value if it is greater and they can perform actions as if they had the Divine Spirit Talent.

name: Last Light
description: You unleash the purest of light which consumes everything, spirit and material alike. The spell creates an area attack with the [@trait Flowing @] and [@trait Immaterial @] traits that does Light Damage. Any creature who receives any amount of damage must make a [@skill SR @] Check of 16 or join with the light, causing their body and spirit to be consumed. This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area, but you, is equally affected.
